meanings.definition: Opposing or designed to counteract submarines.
meanings.sent1: The navy deployed an antisubmarine helicopter to protect the fleet.
meanings.sent2: The antisubmarine net was strategically placed to prevent enemy submarines from entering the harbor.
meanings.sent3: The clever cat devised an antisubmarine plan to catch the fish in the pond.
meanings.sent4: Her wit was like an antisubmarine shield, deflecting any negative comments that came her way.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow color of the antisubmarine buoy made it easily visible in the water.

meanings.definition: A type of warfare or equipment used to combat submarines.
meanings.sent1: The navy invested in advanced antisubmarine technology to protect their ships.
meanings.sent2: During the war, the antisubmarine units were crucial in safeguarding the coast.
meanings.sent3: The playful dolphins seemed to have their own antisubmarine tactics when chasing the submarine.
meanings.sent4: The teamwork among the sailors was an effective antisubmarine strategy against enemy attacks.
meanings.sent5: The loud sonar pings echoed through the ocean as part of the antisubmarine operation.
